Summary: Located across the street from Rockefeller Center, the 3 West Club is near St. Patrick's Cathedral, Radio City Music Hall, many restaurants, and theaters. The hotel's central location is suitable for visiting tourist attractions.

The 414 Hotel is located near Times Square, Restaurant Row, and the theater district, making it easy to walk to many attractions and subway stops. The hotel's central location provides convenient access to restaurants, theaters, and other New York City sights.
60 Thompson is located in the heart of Soho, close to restaurants, shops, and Greenwich Village. The hotel is also within walking distance of a subway station and downtown attractions.

The hotel is in a great location for exploring, with Central Park, Times Square, and many shops and restaurants within walking distance. The Columbus Circle subway stop is right across the street, providing easy access to other parts of Manhattan.
The hotel is near Grand Central station, subway stations, and bus routes, making it easy to travel around the city. Many sights, shops, and restaurants are within walking distance.

The hotel is centrally located, near subway stations, Penn Station, Herald Square, Times Square, the Empire State Building, and Madison Square Park. The hotel provides a convenient location for walking, subway trips, or affordable cab rides to many Manhattan sights.

The Affinia 50 is centrally located near the subway, Grand Central, Times Square, Rockefeller Center, and 5th Avenue, making it easy to walk or take public transportation to explore Manhattan. The hotel also provides maps and directions to help guests navigate the city.
The Affinia Dumont is in a central Manhattan location near the subway, the Empire State Building, and Grand Central Terminal. Guests can request a walking “experience package” and walking maps.

The Affinia Gardens is located on the Upper East Side, within walking distance of museums/art galleries, Central Park, Bloomingdales, and subway stops, offering easy access to main attractions throughout Manhattan. Several reviewers enjoyed walking to various destinations and found the location convenient for exploring the city.

This hotel is in a great location, directly across from Penn Station and Madison Square Garden, with easy access to the subway and many attractions such as the Empire State Building, Times Square, and Macy's. The hotel's central location allows for walking to various neighborhoods like Chelsea, Greenwich Village, and the Flatiron District.

The Affinia Shelburne is centrally located near Grand Central station, Times Square, the Empire State Building, and other attractions, making it easy to walk and explore Manhattan. The hotel also provides complimentary walking kits.
The hotel is in a convenient location, a 5-minute walk from Grand Central Terminus and the UN. Staff can suggest restaurants and places to go in the area.
The Algonquin Hotel is centrally located near Times Square, Broadway, and other attractions, with subway access, making it convenient for sightseeing. Guests recommend walking to nearby locations.

The Americana Inn is in a central location, close to many attractions such as Times Square, Empire State Building, and subways. It is walking distance to many attractions, making it easy to get around the city.

The Amsterdam Court Hotel is centrally located near Times Square, Broadway theaters, and subway lines, making it easy to explore New York City. Many reviewers mention the hotel's close proximity to major attractions and transportation, despite small room sizes.

Astor on the Park is located opposite Central Park and near the 103rd and 110th subway stations, which provide access to mid- and downtown Manhattan. The hotel is also near bus stops and within walking distance of restaurants and shops, although the area is not very touristy and can be quiet at night.

The Hotel Bedford is located near Grand Central Station, providing easy access to subway lines and various attractions. Many tourist destinations such as Times Square, the Empire State Building, and Rockefeller Center are within walking distance.

The Beekman Tower is located near the UN, with the nearest subway station a 10-15 minute walk away, but offers bus transportation on the corner for easy access to Times Square. It is within walking distance to attractions like the Empire State Building, Rockefeller Center, and Grand Central Terminal.

The Belleclaire Hotel is located in the Upper West Side, close to Central Park, subway stations (72nd, 79th St), museums (Natural History Museum, Metropolitan Museum of Art, Guggenheim), Riverside Park, and residential areas. The hotel is near many shops, restaurants (Manhattan Diner, Big Nicks Burger Joint, Patsy's Pizzeria), and bars and provides easy access to other parts of the city via subway.

The Bentley Hotel is located in the Upper East Side, a generally safe area, and is a 10–15 minute walk to the subway, Lexington Avenue, Central Park, Bloomingdales, and Lexington subway station. The 57th St bus stops right outside the hotel, offering access to transportation across town.

This hotel is located in Chinatown and close to Little Italy, SoHo, and the Lower East Side. It is within walking distance of several subway stations, providing easy access to other parts of Manhattan.

The hotel is within walking distance of Times Square, Broadway, Penn Station, and the Javits Convention Center, though some find the 10-15 minute walk long. It is located in an industrial area, which some reviewers found safe to walk around at night.

The Best Western Hospitality House is centrally located, within walking distance of Times Square, Rockefeller Center, Central Park and Grand Central Station, and near subway stations. Many attractions, shops, restaurants and delis are within easy walking distance and the staff can offer helpful recommendations.

The Seaport Inn is located in Lower Manhattan, near the Brooklyn Bridge and the Seaport, with easy access to subway and ferries for sightseeing. It is within walking distance of Wall Street, Ground Zero, Battery Park, Little Italy, and Chinatown.

The Blue Moon Hotel is located in the Lower East Side, near Little Italy, SoHo, Chinatown, and the Tenement Museum. The hotel is also near multiple subway lines providing easy access to Times Square, the Financial District, and Greenwich Village.

The hotel is centrally located with easy access to the subway and within walking distance of the Empire State Building, Times Square, and other attractions. Guests can also find good places to eat and visit with the help of the doorman.

The Buckingham Hotel is located near Central Park, Carnegie Hall, and multiple subway lines, making it easy to explore various parts of New York City. Many reviewers mention the hotel's proximity to major attractions and transportation options as a key benefit.

The hotel is located within a 5-10 minute walk of Times Square and close to the Port Authority bus terminal and Penn Station, providing access to various transportation options. It is also near restaurants in Hell's Kitchen and Restaurant Row.

The Carlton Arms is an artsy, budget-friendly hotel where each room is uniquely decorated by a different artist, encouraging exploration of the hotel itself. It's located in a central and safe area, close to subway stops, restaurants, and attractions, making it a convenient base for exploring New York City.

The hotel is conveniently located near subway lines for exploring the East Village, West Village, and lower Manhattan, though some reviewers wished it was closer to certain lines for easier access. Its location on E 55th puts it near J P Clark's, a nice Irish pub.
The Casablanca Hotel is near Times Square and within walking distance of many areas of interest in Manhattan, as well as close to subway lines. The staff is helpful in offering sightseeing advice.
The Chambers Hotel is located just off Fifth Avenue, close to shops, Central Park, and the theater district. The hotel provides drawing paper and color pencils in the room.

The Chelsea Lodge is located in the Chelsea neighborhood of Manhattan, close to subway stations and within walking distance of various attractions. The hotel's location allows guests to experience the city like a local, with easy access to shops, restaurants, and cultural hotspots.

Chelsea Pines Inn is near multiple subway lines and within walking distance of the West Village, Chelsea, Soho, and Meatpacking District. Guests appreciate the daily newsletter with suggestions of things to do and the central location that provides easy access to many areas of NYC.

This hotel is located within walking distance of Times Square, Broadway, Rockefeller Center, 5th Avenue, and Grand Central. Subway stations are easily accessible for further exploration of the city.

The hotel provides convenient access to explore New York City's sights and transportation.

This hotel is centrally located near the Flatiron Building, with easy access to subway lines and within walking distance of attractions like the Empire State Building and Times Square. Several reviewers mentioned the convenience of the location for exploring various parts of Manhattan.

This hotel is in a great central location, close to the Empire State Building, Macy's, Times Square, and subway stations, making it easy to explore Manhattan. Some rooms offer views of the Empire State Building, and free coffee is available in the lobby.

This hotel is near Times Square, Rockefeller Center, subway lines, bus stops, and Broadway shows. The hotel offers maps and advice from personnel to aid in exploring the area.

This hotel is located in the heart of the theater district, near Times Square, restaurants, and subway and bus stops. Many attractions, such as Times Square, Rockefeller Center, and the Empire State Building, are within walking distance.

The Comfort Inn is within walking distance of Times Square, Penn Station, the Empire State Building, and Macy's, and near subway and bus stops. Some rooms offer views of the city and the Empire State Building.

The hotel is conveniently located near Times Square, major attractions, and transportation options like subway lines and the Port Authority bus station, making it easy to explore the city. The hotel is in a convenient downtown location, close to food, bars, and several subway lines, making it easy to explore the East Village, Greenwich Village, SoHo, and Little Italy. The hotel offers free passes to a fitness center across the street.

The hotel is located on the Upper East Side and is near the subway and bus lines, which provide access to museums and other attractions, and is in a residential neighborhood that is away from the touristy areas. This hotel is centrally located near many attractions like Times Square, the Empire State Building, and Grand Central Station, and is within walking distance of the New York Public Library and Bryant Park; subway access is also convenient. This hotel is conveniently located near a subway station, allowing easy access to various parts of Manhattan, and within walking distance of attractions such as Times Square and Central Park. The concierge offers helpful information and recommendations for exploring the city.

This hotel is conveniently located near Penn Station, subways, and major attractions like Macy's, Times Square, and the Empire State Building, making it easy to get around the city. This hotel is situated in a great location for tourists, with easy walking distance to Central Park, Times Square, and various subway lines for exploring the city. It is also near the Columbus Circle subway station.

This hotel is in a great location near the subway, Penn Station, Madison Square Garden, and the Empire State Building. It's within walking distance to Times Square and near many attractions without the noise and crowds of NYC.

The Omni Berkshire Place is centrally located near shopping, restaurants, subway stations, and attractions like Times Square, Central Park, and Rockefeller Center. The hotel's concierge can provide recommendations and directions.

Park 79 is in an excellent location on the Upper West Side, close to Central Park, museums, and subway stations, making it easy to get around NYC. Many reviewers highlight the hotel's proximity to transportation, restaurants, and cultural attractions, making it a convenient base for exploring the city.

Located between Central Park and Times Square, this hotel provides convenient access to New York's attractions and subway lines. Its proximity to Carnegie Hall and 5th Avenue make it attractive to explorers.

The Park South Hotel is conveniently located near a subway station and within walking distance of many attractions including the Empire State Building, Union Square, Greenwich Village and Grand Central station. The hotel also provides free newspapers and is close to several restaurants.

The Peninsula New York is centrally located on 5th Avenue, near shopping, Central Park, and a short walk from Times Square and Broadway theaters. The hotel's location provides easy access to major sights and subway stops.

The Phillips Club is conveniently located near the 1 and 9 train lines and several Broadway bus lines, providing easy and inexpensive access to various parts of the city, and is steps from the 1-line subway. It is also near Lincoln Center and Columbus Circle.

The Plaza Athenee is located on the Upper East Side, near Central Park, Madison Avenue, and Lexington Avenue. It is within walking distance of museums, shopping, and restaurants, and close to the subway.

The Radisson Martinique's location is a highlight, with easy walking distance to Times Square, the Empire State Building, and Macy's, plus a subway station right outside.  Many guests found it convenient for sightseeing and accessing various parts of Manhattan.

The hotel is in a good location, close to the subway, Empire State Building, Grand Central, and Times Square, making it easy to walk and explore. It's located in the Murray Hill neighborhood, with many Italian and Indian restaurants nearby.

The Red Roof Inn is in an excellent central location in Manhattan near the Empire State Building, Penn Station, and multiple subway lines, making it easy to explore the city. Many reviewers mention walking to Times Square and other attractions and taking the subway to more distant locations.

This hotel is in a great location, close to NYC's finest shopping and top attractions like Central Park, Rock Center, and Times Square, with subway stations nearby for easy access to explore the city. Many guests found the location convenient for walking to various attractions and enjoying the hustle and bustle of New York.

The Renaissance New York Times Square is in a great central location, steps from multiple subway stops and within walking distance of many attractions like Broadway theaters, Rockefeller Center, and 5th Avenue. Guests appreciated the hotel's helpful staff, including the concierge, for restaurant recommendations, directions, and theater information.

The Residence Inn Times Square is centrally located near Times Square, the Theater District, Bryant Park, and Grand Central Station, with easy access to subway lines for exploring Manhattan. It is within walking distance to many attractions, including the Empire State Building, Macy's, and Rockefeller Center.

This hotel is near the 1 train and W / R train entrances, Battery Park attractions, and the walking path up the Hudson River. Many reviewers note that the hotel is a short subway ride from Midtown or within walking distance of the Financial Center, World Trade Memorial, and Chinatown.

The Rockefeller Center Hotel is centrally located near many attractions like Radio City Music Hall, 5th Avenue, Broadway, and Central Park. It is near subway stations, making it easy to explore the city.

The Roger Smith Hotel is centrally located near Grand Central Station, subways, and major attractions like Times Square, Central Park, and 5th Avenue, making it convenient for exploring midtown Manhattan. The hotel provides free computers in the lobby with maps and flyers for tourist information.

The Roger Williams Hotel is conveniently located near subways, shopping, and within walking distance of many NYC attractions including Central Park and Times Square. The hotel is also described as a good launching point for exploring uptown or downtown.

This hotel is centrally located near Times Square, 5th Avenue, Central Park, and subway stations making it easy to reach other parts of the city. Many attractions, restaurants and broadway shows are within walking distance.

The Royalton Hotel is located in Midtown Manhattan, within walking distance of Times Square, 5th Avenue, Broadway, and Grand Central. The hotel's location provides convenient access to major attractions, shopping, and transportation hubs.

The Salisbury Hotel is in a great location for exploring, with Central Park, Times Square, and subway stations within walking distance. Many attractions like Carnegie Hall, the Theater District, and Central Park are easily accessible from the hotel.
The San Carlos Hotel is in a great location within walking distance to many attractions and offers subway access nearby. The hotel provides maps and directions to help guests navigate the city.

Seafarers International House is located near Union Square, a major subway hub, providing easy access to explore various parts of New York City. The hotel is close to shops, restaurants, and attractions, making it a convenient base for exploring Manhattan.

This hotel has a fantastic location, within walking distance of Central Park, Times Square, 5th Avenue, and Broadway; there is a subway stop right outside of the entrance. Many attractions are located within walking distance of the hotel.

The Skyline Hotel is within walking distance of Times Square, Broadway shows, the Hop-On/Off bus, and subway stations, allowing for convenient exploration of New York City. Some guests mention discovering local restaurants and diners in the surrounding Hell's Kitchen neighborhood.

The hotel is located in Tribeca, close to the subway, and within walking distance of the West Village, Meatpacking District, Soho, Chinatown, and Little Italy. Several reviewers mentioned that the hotel's location made it easy to explore many different parts of Manhattan.

The Sofitel New York is ideally located in midtown Manhattan between 5th and 6th Avenue and near Times Square and Grand Central, making it easy to access many tourist hotspots and explore different parts of Manhattan. The hotel is within walking distance of Broadway theaters, shopping on 5th Ave, Rockefeller Center, Central Park, and close to subway stations.

The Soho Grand is located in the heart of SoHo and within walking distance of many shops, restaurants, subway lines, Greenwich Village, Little Italy, Chinatown and Tribeca. It's located on a cool street, convenient for both downtown and midtown, and close to subway lines that provide access to uptown and Brooklyn.

The hotel is located in the Meatpacking District, within walking distance of Greenwich Village and the West Village, and surrounded by shops, restaurants, and clubs. The staff can provide recommendations and reservations for restaurants and clubs.

The Stay Hotel is in a great location, just off Times Square/Broadway theaters and a couple of blocks from fashionable 5th Ave and Central Park. It is near the start of the hop on-hop off bus tour and close to the subway.

The Alex Hotel is within walking distance of Grand Central Station, the Chrysler building, the UN, and many shops and restaurants. The hotel's location allows for easy access to the subway and many key sights and buildings, but is off the main strip, allowing for a quieter stay.

The Belvedere Hotel is in an excellent location, within walking distance of Times Square, Broadway shows, Restaurant Row, Central Park, Rockefeller Center and close to several subway lines. The Gray Line tour bus stop is around the corner from the hotel.

Located in midtown Manhattan, The Benjamin is near the subway and within walking distance of many attractions, including Rockefeller Plaza, Times Square, and Central Park. The hotel provides maps, directions, and information to facilitate exploration.

The Blakely Hotel is conveniently located near Central Park, Times Square, and multiple subway stations, making it easy to walk to many attractions. Several reviewers also appreciated the proximity to shops, restaurants, and theaters.

The Bowery Hotel is located within walking distance of shops, bars, and restaurants in the NoHo, SoHo, and Greenwich areas, close to Bleecker Street & Lafayette Street, or Houston Street & Lafayette Street, and near the Village, Soho, and East Village. It is also near subway stops and a short walk to the Meatpacking District.
The Bryant Park Hotel is centrally located near Times Square, Grand Central Terminal, and subway lines. Bryant Park, right across the street, provides a relaxing break from the city.

The Carlton Hotel is centrally located with easy access to subway lines and is within walking distance of the Empire State Building, Macy's, Union Square, and Times Square. Some rooms have views of the Empire State building, making it a great spot for sightseeing.

The Carlyle is located in the Upper East Side, near Central Park, museums like the Met and Whitney, and Madison Avenue boutiques. The hotel is a residential building with hotel rooms right next to residential apartments.

The Franklin Hotel is located on the upper east side, one block from the subway and within walking distance of Central Park and museums. Its location provides easy access to transportation and cultural attractions.

The French Quarters Guest Apartments is located on Restaurant Row, close to Times Square, Broadway theaters, and multiple subway lines. It is within walking distance of the Museum of Modern Art and Central Park.

The Gem Hotel Chelsea is in a great central location in Chelsea, one block from the subway and a short walk to the Highline, galleries, bookstores, and restaurants. The hotel is located on a residential street, steps away from 8th Avenue, with many familiar shops and NYC finds nearby.
The hotel is located within walking distance of Times Square, Penn Station, and Madison Square Garden, with a subway stop nearby. Some reviewers mentioned feeling unsafe walking in the area at night.

The Gem Hotel's location is near multiple subway lines and within walking distance of SoHo, Little Italy, Chinatown, the Lower East Side, and the East Village. Nearby attractions include Katz's Deli, Russ & Daughters, and the New Museum.

The Grant Hotel is located on the Upper West Side, close to the 96th Street subway station and within walking distance of Central Park, restaurants, and grocery stores. It offers budget-friendly accommodations with easy access to Times Square and other NYC attractions via subway.

Located in the heart of the Theater District, this hotel is within walking distance of Times Square, Central Park, and many restaurants, with subways conveniently located nearby for easy access to other attractions. The hotel provides maps and directions.

The hotel is located one block from Central Park and close to subways, shopping, and restaurants, with a short cab ride to Times Square and Museum Mile. Some rooms have kitchenettes and sitting areas.

This hotel is located on Central Park South, across the street from Central Park and near subway stops, making it easy to walk to major Manhattan sites, museums, and 5th Avenue. Several reviewers mentioned being able to see fireworks and concerts in Central Park from their rooms.

The Herald Square Hotel is centrally located in midtown Manhattan, near the Empire State Building, Macy's, and multiple subway stations, making it easy to explore the city. Many reviewers mention the convenience of walking to various attractions like Times Square, Penn Station, and Madison Square Garden.

Hotel 91 is located in the heart of Manhattan's Chinatown, near the Lower East Side, Little Italy, and within walking distance of the Brooklyn Bridge. The hotel is close to the subway, providing access to other areas of the city.

The Hotel at Times Square is in a great location within walking distance to Times Square/theatre district, 5th Avenue shopping, Rockefeller Center, and many sites; subway lines are also nearby. The hotel provides maps and advice to help with exploring.
The hotel is located in the Gramercy area, near Gramercy Park, and is within walking distance of other attractions. The hotel's location provides a quiet escape within the city.

The Iroquois Hotel is located in midtown Manhattan between 5th and 6th Avenue and is within walking distance of Times Square, Broadway, Grand Central Station, and many other attractions. The hotel is near subway lines as well as bus stops.

The Jane Hotel is located in the West Village, Meatpacking District, and Greenwich Village, near the Hudson River, with subway access a few blocks away. It is close to restaurants, shops, and attractions like the High Line Park, making it a convenient base for exploring NYC.

The Kimberly Hotel is in midtown Manhattan, close to the subway and within walking distance of Rockefeller Center, Times Square, and Central Park. The hotel provides a complimentary business center and concierge services to help plan travel around the city.

The Lombardy is centrally located on 56th St between Park and Lex, with the subway two blocks away at 54th and Lex, and within walking distance of Grand Central, Central Park, and shopping on 5th. Its location provides easy access to restaurants, diners, delis, bars, drug stores, and various Manhattan attractions.
The London NYC is conveniently located near Central Park, 5th Avenue shopping, and Times Square. Many reviewers noted being able to walk to theaters, museums, and other attractions from the hotel.

The Lucerne is located on the Upper West Side, close to Central Park, museums, restaurants and subways, making it easy to explore the city. Some reviewers mention that the hotel is within walking distance of many attractions, and well-connected to public transportation.

The Manhattan Club is centrally located near Times Square, Central Park, Broadway, and subway entrances, making it easy to walk to many New York landmarks. The hotel is also close to shopping, restaurants, museums, and Carnegie Hall.

The Mansfield Hotel is centrally located near Times Square, Broadway, Grand Central Station and Fifth Avenue, making it easy to walk to many attractions and subway lines. Several reviewers noted that the hotel's central location made it a great base for exploring the city.

The Marcel at Gramercy is conveniently located near the subway, city buses, and many restaurants, and is within walking distance to Times Square, Chelsea, SOHO, Greenwich Village, and other areas. Many attractions are not far away, and the metro is only a few blocks away.

The Maritime Hotel is located near the Meatpacking District and Chelsea, within walking distance of various shops, restaurants, and attractions like Chelsea Market, Greenwich Village, and the Highline Park. The hotel also offers bicycles for rent, encouraging guests to explore the city.

The Mark is located on the Upper East Side, close to museums, art galleries, Central Park, and upscale shopping. The hotel is near Madison and Fifth Avenue, and a five-minute walk to the Metropolitan Art Museum.

The Marmara Manhattan is located on the Upper East Side, a residential area that provides a neighborhood feel, with easy access to the subway for exploring the city. It is within walking distance of Central Park, museums, and a variety of restaurants and shops.

The Mave is centrally located in midtown Manhattan, within walking distance to subway stops, Madison Park, and Union Square. Its location provides easy access to uptown and downtown attractions, good restaurants, and various New York City highlights.

The Mercer is located in SoHo, within walking distance of Greenwich Village, NoLita, NoHo, and the East and West Village, with easy access to subway connections. The hotel provides suggestions for restaurants and lesser-known city treasures.

The Michelangelo Hotel is centrally located in the Theater District, within walking distance of Times Square, 5th Avenue shopping, Rockefeller Center, and Central Park, and close to several subway stations. The hotel is near Broadway theaters, 5th Avenue shops, Rockefellar Center, and The Diamond District.

The Milburn Hotel is located in the Upper West Side, close to Central Park, museums, shops, restaurants, and multiple subway stations for easy access to other parts of the city. The hotel provides a library, videos, and access to a local swimming pool.
The Muse Hotel is located a short walk from Times Square, theaters, Rockefeller Center, Central Park, and subway stations. Many reviewers found the location to be convenient for exploring the city.

The New York Helmsley is centrally located near Grand Central Station, Times Square, and other attractions, making it easy to walk and explore. Subway stations are also close by for further exploration.

The New Yorker Hotel is conveniently located near Penn Station, subway lines, and many attractions like Times Square, Macy's, and the Empire State Building, making it easy to explore the city. It is possible to reach many sites of NYC by walking.

The Pierre is located across from Central Park and near 5th Avenue shopping, with convenient access to many parts of the city via taxi. The hotel is near a subway stop and within walking distance of Museum Mile and the Theater District.

The hotel is located at the south end of Central Park on 5th Ave, equidistant between the Guggenheim, the Metropolitan Museum, MoMA, and Broadway theaters, and a stone's throw from the high-end 5th Avenue stores. The hotel pays for water and fruit for early morning runners between 6 and 8 am.

The Pod Hotel is in a great location for exploring Midtown East, with many attractions within walking distance and easy access to multiple subway lines. Many reviewers mentioned its proximity to the subway, Times Square, Central Park, and various restaurants, bars, and shops.

The Premier is located near Times Square, within walking distance of the Empire State Building, Central Park, and Grand Central Station. Cabs are readily available on 7th Avenue and Broadway for further exploration.

The Ritz-Carlton Central Park is located across the street from Central Park and within walking distance of 5th Avenue, Madison Avenue shops, Times Square, and many major attractions. The hotel also offers a complimentary car service to take guests anywhere on the island of Manhattan.

The Roosevelt Hotel is located in midtown Manhattan, near Grand Central Station, Times Square, and other attractions. Many reviewers mention that the central location is ideal for walking and exploring the city.

The Sherry-Netherland is located on 5th Avenue, directly across from Central Park, providing easy access to mid-town meetings, restaurants, boutique shops, Broadway theaters, Rockefeller Center, and museums. The hotel's location facilitates exploration of New York City with convenient access to cabs and proximity to various attractions.

The Shoreham Hotel is conveniently located near shopping, museums, food, and the subway, making it easy to explore the city. It is also within walking distance of Central Park, 5th Avenue, MOMA, Rockefeller Center, Times Square, and Broadway.

The St. Regis is centrally located on 5th Avenue and 55th Street, close to Central Park, shopping, dining and the theater district with convenient access to transportation and nearby attractions such as the Disney store and Rockefeller Center. The hotel also offers a car service that will take you places within 10 blocks.

The Standard is located in the Meatpacking District near the West Village and Chelsea, making it easy to walk to shops and restaurants. It is also located above the High Line, providing access to that park.

The Surrey Hotel is located on the Upper East Side, a block from Central Park and near museums, with subway access a few blocks away. Some reviewers mention exploring nearby restaurants and shops on Madison and Lexington Avenues.

The Sylvan Guest House is located in Harlem, near a subway stop for easy access to Manhattan and other parts of New York City, and close to historical landmarks like the Jumel Mansion. The surrounding neighborhood offers a unique experience with local restaurants and a safe environment for exploration.

The Time Hotel is in a great location for exploring NYC, right off Times Square, close to subways, theaters, and many attractions. Some guests have noted that the rooms are small, so it may function best as a convenient and centrally located base for exploring the city.

This hotel is in an excellent location with a subway station across the street and is walking distance from 5th Avenue, Grand Central, Central Park, Rockefeller Center, and Times Square. It is near bus tours and also offers car and taxi services.

The Westin New York at Times Square is in a central location, one block from Times Square, within walking distance to major attractions, and close to several subway lines. There are many restaurants, shops and theaters within walking distance, and the hotel provides maps to help guests navigate the city.

The Thirty Thirty Hotel is in a great midtown location, near subway lines, the Empire State Building, Macy's, Times Square, Grand Central Station, and many restaurants and shops. This hotel is a convenient base for sightseeing and offers easy access to transportation.

The Thompson LES is located in the Lower East Side, close to a subway stop, and within walking distance of bars, restaurants, shopping in LES, Soho, Chinatown, and the East Village. Some reviewers recommend nearby restaurants such as Rayuela, Stanton Social, and Russ & Daughters.

The Travel Inn is conveniently located near Times Square and the subway, granting easy access to downtown and uptown areas, and is within walking distance to many NY landmarks. It is a short walk to Times Square, theaters, Circle Line cruises, and the bus station.
The Tribeca Grand is located in a convenient area in walking distance to Soho, Chinatown and Little Italy, and is close to subway lines. The hotel also offers free bicycles that can be borrowed.

The hotel is located across the street from Central Park and adjacent to the Columbus Circle subway station, providing convenient access to various parts of the city. Many attractions such as Times Square, Fifth Avenue, Madison Avenue, the theater district, and numerous restaurants are within walking distance.

The Tudor Hotel is in a central location, close to Grand Central Station, with easy access to subway and bus lines. Many attractions like Times Square, the Empire State Building, and the UN are within walking distance.

The Vincci Avalon is centrally located near the Empire State Building, Macy's, and multiple subway stations, making it easy to access various parts of Manhattan. Many reviewers mention the ability to walk to major attractions and the convenience of the location for exploring the city.

The W The Court is in a central location, a few blocks from Grand Central Station, making it easy to get around Manhattan. The hotel is within walking distance of many destinations and close to subway lines.

The hotel is located near Grand Central Station, Times Square, and other attractions, with subway access and a free Acura car service for transport around Manhattan. The hotel's central location in midtown Manhattan allows guests to easily walk or take a short cab ride to major neighborhoods.

The W Times Square is centrally located in Times Square, near theaters, shopping, restaurants, subway stations, and tour bus stops, making it easy to get around the city. Some reviewers mention the option to walk to various attractions such as Penn Station, Gershwin Theater, Central Park, and Restaurant Row.

The W Union Square is in an excellent location with convenient access to subway lines, Greenwich Village, Soho, and various shops and restaurants. The hotel is near the Union Square Greenmarket and within walking distance of many attractions.

The Waldorf Towers is centrally located in NYC, within walking distance of Broadway Theatres, Empire State Building, Times Square, and Central Park, with easy access to subway and taxis. Some reviewers mention exploring nearby attractions like Greenwich Village, the Metropolitan Museum of Art, and various shops on foot.

The Wall Street Inn is located in the Financial District, close to several subway lines and attractions like Battery Park, the Staten Island Ferry, and the Brooklyn Bridge. It is near historic sites and a street with a variety of restaurants.

The Warwick Hotel is centrally located in midtown Manhattan, within walking distance of Central Park, Times Square, 5th Avenue shopping, Rockefeller Center, Radio City Music Hall, and Broadway theaters. Several subway lines are within a few blocks, providing easy access to other parts of the city.

The Washington Jefferson Hotel is located within walking distance of Times Square, Broadway theaters, Central Park, and subway stations, encouraging exploration of midtown Manhattan. Some reviewers recommend exploring nearby restaurants on 9th Avenue and using the subway to discover New York.

The Washington Square Hotel is located in Greenwich Village, near a subway station, making it easy to explore different parts of NYC including Soho, the East Village, and the West Village. The hotel is within walking distance of various restaurants, shops, bars, music venues, and attractions like Washington Square Park.

Located between Central Park and Times Square, the Wellington Hotel is near attractions, shops, and restaurants; a subway station is located just outside, offering convenient access to other parts of the city. Many reviewers mention the hotel's prime location for walking to various NYC destinations.

The hotel is centrally located in Manhattan, near multiple subway lines and within walking distance of Central Park, Columbus Circle, Lincoln Center, Times Square, Carnegie Hall, and several museums. The hotel provides umbrellas for guest use.

This hotel is within walking distance of Times Square, Macy's, Empire State Building, and Penn Station, and is near many subway lines. The hotel provides maps and tourist guides and is in a central midtown location.

The Wolcott Hotel is centrally located near the Empire State Building, Macy's, Times Square, and multiple subway stations, making it easy to explore Manhattan. The hotel is within walking distance of many attractions, and there is tour agent in the lobby that offers one-day trips to Washington D.C., Boston, and Philadelphia.

The hotel is located in the Upper West Side, close to the 72nd street subway stop, Central Park, Riverside Park, and various shops and restaurants. Some rooms include kitchenettes, which allow guests to prepare their own meals.

This hotel is conveniently located near Penn Station, Times Square, and multiple subway lines, making it easy to explore various parts of Manhattan. Many attractions, including the Empire State Building, Macy's, and Madison Square Garden, are within walking distance.
